statements: SELECT * FROM clothing_production WHERE production_status = 'completed';
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM clothing_production WHERE fabric_type = 'cotton';
SELECT design_name, fabric_type, manufacturing_process FROM clothing_production WHERE designer_name = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM clothing_production ORDER BY design_id DESC;
SELECT designer_name, fabric_type, production_status FROM clothing_production ORDER BY manufacturing_process ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_production WHERE fabric_type='Denim' AND production_status='Completed';
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM clothing_production WHERE production_status='In Progress' ORDER BY designer_name ASC;
SELECT design_name, fabric_type FROM clothing_production WHERE production_status='Pending' ORDER BY design_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_production WHERE manufacturing_process='Sewing' AND production_status='In Progress' LIMIT 5;
SELECT design_id, design_name, fabric_type FROM clothing_production WHERE fabric_type IN ('Cotton', 'Silk') OR manufacturing_process='Dyeing' ORDER BY design_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM design;
SELECT design_id, design_name FROM design ORDER BY design_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM manufacturing WHERE manufacturer='Company XYZ';
SELECT design_id, COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing GROUP BY design_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT design_id, manufacturing_date FROM manufacturing ORDER BY manufacturing_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM design WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM design ORDER BY design_id DESC;
SELECT design.design_name, manufacturing.manufacturer FROM design JOIN manufacturing ON design.design_id = manufacturing.design_id WHERE manufacturing_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT design.design_name, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM design JOIN manufacturing ON design.design_id = manufacturing.design_id GROUP BY design.design_name HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer FROM manufacturing ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT * FROM clothing_design;
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM clothing_design ORDER BY design_date DESC;
SELECT fabric_type, fabric_color, fabric_quantity FROM fabric_inventory WHERE fabric_quantity > 100;
SELECT process_id, manufacturing_date, manufacturing_stage FROM manufacturing_process WHERE manufacturing_stage = 'Cutting';
SELECT * FROM clothing_design WHERE designer_name = 'John Smith';
SELECT * FROM clothing_design WHERE designer_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM clothing_design ORDER BY design_date DESC;
SELECT design_name, fabric_color FROM clothing_design JOIN fabric_inventory ON fabric_inventory.fabric_id = clothing_design.design_id;
SELECT manufacturing_stage, COUNT(*) FROM manufacturing_process GROUP BY manufacturing_stage;
SELECT fabric_type, SUM(fabric_quantity) AS total_quantity FROM fabric_inventory GROUP BY fabric_type HAVING total_quantity > 100;
SELECT * FROM Design;
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM Design WHERE design_id = 1;
SELECT material_name, quantity FROM Material WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT design_name, material_type FROM Design JOIN Material ON Design.design_id = Material.material_id;
SELECT production_date, manufacturing_location FROM Production JOIN Manufacturing ON Production.production_id = Manufacturing.production_id;
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM Design;
SELECT material_name, material_type, quantity FROM Material WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT production_date, production_quantity FROM Production WHERE production_quantity BETWEEN 50 AND 100;

SELECT design_name, material_name, production_date, manufacturing_location FROM Design JOIN Production ON Design.design_id = Production.design_id JOIN Material ON Production.material_id = Material.material_id JOIN Manufacturing ON Production.production_id = Manufacturing.production_id;

SELECT designer_name, production_date, manufacturing_location FROM Design JOIN Production ON Design.design_id = Production.design_id JOIN Manufacturing ON Production.production_id = Manufacturing.production_id WHERE manufacturing_location LIKE '%Factory%';
SELECT * FROM Design;
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM Design ORDER BY design_name DESC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_type FROM Pattern WHERE pattern_type = 'Geometric';
SELECT material_name, material_price FROM Material WHERE material_price > 100.00;
SELECT production_id, production_date FROM Production WHERE production_quantity >= 50 ORDER BY production_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Design ORDER BY design_id DESC;
SELECT design_name, designer_name FROM Design WHERE design_id = 2;
SELECT material_name, material_type, material_price FROM Material WHERE material_price > 100 ORDER BY material_name ASC;
SELECT pattern_name, pattern_type FROM Pattern WHERE pattern_type = 'floral';
SELECT sample_name, production_date FROM Sample JOIN Production ON Sample.sample_id = Production.sample_id WHERE production_quantity > 10 ORDER BY production_date DESC;
